snippet: SIMON--Judith, (nee Bychowsky), age 100, wife of the late Bob Simon, passed away on June 15 peacefully at home. Born in Moscow, brought up in Montreal, she moved to NYC in 1947. She spoke four languages and lived a full life as a teacher, traveler, wife, mother. She is survived by three children, Joanie, Peter, Nina, six grandchildren and one great-grandchild. Donations in her name may be made to the Jeremy Bram Faulkner Scholarship Fund, Camp Kinderland, 16 Court Street, Suite 2200, Brooklyn, NY 11241. 1/3
